name: SCARF GAME (ALPHA)
description:
This is the alpha build for my newest project, Scarf Game!

Scarf Game is a platformer with a variety of obstacles to learn and overcome.

As of right now, the only available gamemode is the level editor. With the level editor, you can create an episode (a collection of levels). In levels, there are many options for hazards, movement obstacles, and enemies to guide the player. You can even link objects together using logic to create more intricate interactions.

Join the discord server to share your levels and talk about the game!
